body.name: Ergonomic Office Chair with Adaptive Backrest, High Back Computer Desk Chair with 4D Armrests, Adjustable Seat Depth, Lumbar Support and 2D Headrest, Swivel Task Chair, Black
features: ADAPTIVE BACKREST-The adaptive backrest design possibilities make it the perfect solution for keeping your shoulder in the right position and relaxing your vertebra. Here we go, lean against the backrest, it allows you to turn around a range and stretch your back up and down. Support you always, a really ergonomic design.

4D ARMREST & 2D HEADREST-Our 4D armrests we pick can move left and right, adjust up and down, back and forth, and rotate 15°. What is more, the 2D headrest can lift up and down, and rotate to find the perfect fit for your neck

ADJUSTABLE SEAT DEPTH & LUMBAR SUPPORT-It is rare that a chair feature a seat depth adjustment, for we build the chairs for customers of different height. And people need adjustable thigh pressure while sitting, which is suitable for relaxation. And it is good to adjust lifting back support to provide customized sitting support.

SUSTAINABLE & RELIASBLE-This office chair has been tested for office use and meets the requirements for durability and stability set forth in the following standards: EN 1335 and ANSI/BIFMA x5.1.. Mesh with good support, high-density backrest frame material, chair legs that can stand 1136kg strength, 35mm thickened mechanism, HOLLUDLE does it all.

5 YEAR PARTS WARRANTY & EASY ASSEMBLE-This office chair comes with a 5-year guarantee because the chairs are made of high-quality material. Moreover, it takes about 20 minutes to assemble it without pressure, check the user manual and assemble video show how to screw effectively srews , and welcome to contact us

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Chair I received was damage during shipping with dents and scratches. But I was able to get in contact with company by via email and was compensated for the damage parts. Even though the chair had damage parts it was still easily to put together. Also I notices the Holludle office chair was lot more confrontable then my older Ikea chair which I bought 9 years ago and costed me 300 at the time. Making this Holludle chair a big upgrade for me snice my Ikea chair was about to go on me with its cushions gone and armrest about fall off and only costing about double the price. I'm not happy about how the Holludle chair came to me, but I'm happy with how Holludle was able to resolve my issues pretty quickly. The only reason I pick out this chair over the others is because the adjustability of chair and movable backrest when turning side to side. Comfortability is pretty high for chair like this coming at such a good price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Sturdy. Easy to Assemble
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent office chair. Very ergonomic and relaxing. I work from home and I can sit on this chair for my work all day. Its very easy to assemble. The built is very sturdy with flexible options to move up and down and also front and back. I would recommend this any day and surprisingly very reasonably priced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holuddle - What's in a name? Good review here
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this to replace a nice large leather (faux) from S**m's a few years ago - very large and comfortable, but a bit awkward in my tight corner of my Office at home. And a bit used. This chair is a bit smaller sized and fits better at my desk. Comfortable? Pretty good, but a hard (firm?) seat (well, compared to last one), but it's OK. Pads on the armrests would have been nice, but that's a very minor point. Armrest adjustments OK, but I will get them to where I want and then leave them. Ditto on the headrest. Seat is OK for a 6-footer and i weigh about 180 lbs. (I hate when I read reviews and I don't know the size of the reviewer!) Wide base with 6 rollers. Last chair was a smaller base but had wood and metal with 5 rollers. Other 'adjusties' (up-and-down, in-and-out, and back-and-forth) and such seem OK...so far. The 'put-together' was simple enough and took an hour and a cup of coffee or two. I didn't bother to see the videos...just looked at the pictures that came with the screws and such. Simple enough. So, for about $160 or so (I got $50 off the $209.99 price on 14 Dec 23, but see it for $164.98 today, just a week later), it's a fair priced chair. I would congratulate the firm on the packing (good), and the assembly (simple enough), and the quick shipping time before Xmas was appreciated. I would recommend this product and vendor. Thanks, Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars excellent chair, honest review
reviews.reviewText: I work from home full time and have gotten a lot of use out of this chair. It's quite comfortable. It's sturdy enough. The arm rests are great for my height. It adapts perfectly to my Flexispot sit/stand desk. I bought the chair in white and I really dig the style. I'm a decent sized guy at 6'1" 220 lbs. The chair works perfectly and the headrest is optional, so I took it off. The wheels had really slowed down and been struggling, but they're standard wheels, so I popped them off and ordered replacements. The chair is now better than ever at about 6 months of consistent use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's pretty good.
reviews.reviewText: This is the first ergonomic chair I've owned, the chair I had before was a gaming chair. And if you know anything about gaming chairs, they're awful. This chair is very easy to assemble, not too heavy. It's comfortable and I immediately noticed a HUGE difference in back support upon trying it out compared to my old chair. I'm a streamer so I spend basically 24/7 at my desk and hopefully this'll last me a long while. I say you should definitely go for it if you're switching from a gamer chair cause you'll notice the difference. That being said, I am 5'6 and around a hundred pounds, the size is perfect for me but I wouldn't purchase it if you're taller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Overall, this chair is really solid for its price. It has a lot of adjustable features including the armrests, lumbar support, and headrest. It was really easy to assemble and all the necessary tools were provided. I was originally looking at pricier chairs but ultimately decided on this one. This is much more comfortable than my old office chair. I recommend if you are looking for an ergonomic chair at a decent price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good bang for your buck ergonomic chair with great adjustability and comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good product worth buying
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this office chair, and I couldn’t be more satisfied. The ergonomic design provides excellent support for long work hours, and the adjustable features make it customizable to my comfort. The quality of materials is impressive, ensuring durability. The smooth rolling casters and swivel feature add to the overall convenience. Definitely a worthwhile investment for anyone seeking a comfortable and functional office chair!

Overall, this is a great chair, especially for the price.The seat is very comfortable and the size is very roomy.shipping very good too.I am lucky enough and I still work from home. I decided to replace my old chair. After reading some reviews, I ordered this one.

La silla llego con paquetería UPS y no llegó en las mejores condiciones la caja, ya que venía picada de un lado donde ya se asomaba el raspón en el producto. Abriendo el paquete y revisando todas las piezas me di cuenta que solo fue un raspón derivado del traslado que afecta solo lo estético (muy poco) y no lo funcional por lo que dado el tiempo de entrega que fue de 15 días y que personalmente no aguantaba la anterior silla, de ido quedarmela y no devolverla, ni pedir reembolso (lo hable también con el vendedor y muy amable me ofreció el reembolso pero yo no lo quise).Por otra parte en lo funcional la silla es totalmente cómoda y como también comentan hay veces que la cabecera no la uso porque si queda un poco atrás, pero es cuestión de acostumbrarse también. El giro, la reclinación, los ajustes de reposabrazos, el ajuste del asiento y la altura son muy buenos, ideoneos para trabajar Home Office, llevo ya 15 días con ella y no e sentido dolor cervical, al contrario se me fue el que tenía con la anterior silla, paso alrededor de 10 horas max. en la silla por mi trabajo y a parte mi tiempo libre y en ningún momento sientes cansancio de la silla o dolor lumbar/cervical.La recomiendo 100% si la buscan para Home Office o a fin de cuentas pasar mucho tiempo sentado, ya que no sientes tampoco calor o frío por la malla del respaldo la cuál también es muy resistente y apoya también mucho el ajuste lumbar.Otro aspecto extra es que la silla es un poco más grande que yo, mido 1.72 y peso 62 kg entonces siento que me sobra silla pero nada que todos los ajustes combinados no puedan resolver. Y por otra parte la silla es pesada ya que está hecha de muy buenos materiales.Le puse 4 estrellas solamente por el aspecto de la paquetería pero en funcionalidad es un 10.

reviews.reviewTitle: Firm, confortable, great design / Firme, cómoda bien diseñada
reviews.reviewText: I've been using it for 1 month and it is an excelent product.Much better than the chairs I check in stores (like 50, only the ones over 1,900 USD were similar)Me llegó hace un mes y les puedo decir que es una silla excelente.Firme, cómoda, bien construida. Mucho mejor que las sillas que probé en múltiples tiendas (unas 50. La única similar costaba 35,000 pesos)Se tardó en llegar, pero todo llegó en perfectas condiciones

La chaise de bureau ergonomique que j'ai choisie a vraiment dépassé mes attentes. Son design moderne en blanc apporte une touche élégante à mon espace de travail. Ce qui la distingue vraiment, ce sont les fonctionnalités ergonomiques exceptionnelles. Le dossier adaptable offre un soutien parfait à ma colonne vertébrale, et les accoudoirs 4D permettent une personnalisation ultime pour un confort optimal.J'apprécie particulièrement la possibilité de régler la profondeur d'assise selon mes préférences, ce qui la rend idéale pour des sessions de travail prolongées. Le soutien lombaire et l'appui-tête 2D ajoutent une couche supplémentaire de confort et de soutien, ce qui fait vraiment la différence lors de longues journées devant l'ordinateur.En plus de son confort exceptionnel, la qualité de fabrication est également remarquable. La chaise est solide, les matériaux sont durables, et l'assemblage a été facile. Dans l'ensemble, c'est un investissement qui vaut chaque centime pour améliorer mon expérience de travail quotidienne. Je recommande vivement cette chaise de bureau ergonomique à tous ceux qui recherchent un mélange parfait de confort, de style et de fonctionnalité!

reviews.reviewTitle: Es ist ein bequemer und breiter Stuhl
reviews.reviewText: Lieferung mit klaren, leicht verständlichen Anweisungen sowie den Inbusschrauben und dem Schraubendreher. mit ein paar Ersatzschrauben. Der Sitz ist solide und bequem. Einstellbar und perfekt für die Büroarbeit. Toller Stuhl für den Preis. Es ist viel bequemer als mein vorheriger Stuhl. und die Farbe passt absolut perfekt zu meinem Schreibtisch-Setup.
